page.title: 20SCHOOLS
page.content:
This D-block was compiled by pupils from these schools:
{Eastburn Primary.}Size 102 pupils.The work was completed during half a term by classes 3 and 4. {Glusburn County Primary.}270 pupils. Main contribution from one group of 4th year pupils during half a term. {Kildwick Primary.}67 pupils.Main contribution from 9-11 year olds. {Silsden, Hothfield Street Junior. 275 pupils. Contribution from 90 third years. {Steeton Primary.}Size 187 pupils. Work done by Class 5, 8-9 year olds and one 11 year old. {South Craven Comprehensive}(11-18) 1,759 pupils. Work undertaken by a group of 40 aged 14-18 during 4 days of Project Week.
